## PACKAGES

```{r, warning = F}
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(openxlsx)
library(stringr)
library(plyr)
library(writexl)
library(dplyr)
```
## SETWORKING DIRECTORY
```{r}
set_wd <- function() {
library(rstudioapi)
current_path <- getActiveDocumentContext()$path 
setwd(dirname(current_path ))
print( getwd() )
}
```
